subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|t2=吿}}
Cognate with {{cog|th|กล่าว||to say; to declare}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[report]] to
# to [[tell]]; to [[inform]]
# to [[request]]
# to [[announce]]; to [[declare]]
# to [[expose]]; to [[denounce]]
# to [[accuse]]; to [[sue]]; to [[file]] a [[lawsuit]]; to [[press charges]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} to [[call]]

subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|t2=吿|alt=校,較}}
